title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Preparing for another round of voter fraud in November Bev Harris is a consumer and political activist who founder... <!--more--> Black Box Voting Inc – a national non profit elections watchdog organization that investigates security flaws and weaknesses in electronic voting systems.
In 2003, attention to Bev’s research into flaws in the Diebold Election Systems resulted in national attention and later confirmation from research performed at Rice and Johns Hopkins universities.
Over the years, she and her organization have discovered widespread corruption in electronic voting systems corporations, such as the ability for systems to be easily hacked to distort voting records, falsification of security reports, Bev is the author of the book “Black Box Voting” and was featured in the HBO documentary “Hacking Democracy.”
